title: Bookkeeper / Medical receptionist/ Assistant
job_overview:
Virtual medical receptionist  needed in New York City. Must be willing to work graveyard shifts, 10 am -6pm EST.

This candidate must have excellent patient service skills. Effective interpersonal and communications skills are required. Must have a pleasant telephone demeanor and be a team player.   Must know quickbook online.


Requirements for this position:
1. Fast internet connection ( upload and download >100 Mbps with VPN on )
2. Dual Monitor desktop computer set up
3. Designated, sound proofed, and quiet room to work


Please reply if interested to Upgrade to see actual info

MUST email  the following to be considered:
1. CV
2. Audio or video Recording ~1min long introducing yourself
3.Internet speed with VPN on AND connected to USA screenshot.
4. Internet speed without VPN screenshot.
5. Computer Specifications (PC and laptop)
6. A photo of your work station
7. DISC personality test results.
